meanings.definition: A wire or strip of metal, plastic, or other material that is sewn into the lower edge of a bra cup to provide support and shape.
meanings.sent1: The underwires in my bra help keep everything in place.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new bra with comfortable underwires for better support.
meanings.sent3: The underwires in her bra decided to take a break and popped out during an important meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was like underwires, giving her the support she needed to face any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The underwires felt like tiny superheroes, holding up her bust with ease.

meanings.definition: The metal or plastic wire used in the construction of a bra to provide support and shape to the cups.
meanings.sent1: I prefer bras with underwires for extra comfort.
meanings.sent2: The underwires in her bra were starting to poke through the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The underwires in his bra seemed to have a mind of their own, poking him at the most inconvenient times.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like underwires, shaping her goals and providing the necessary support.
meanings.sent5: The underwires gleamed under the store lights, promising a perfect fit and lift.
